column1: #Text=Sokka says : " I think I know who you mean . "
#Text=And to tell you the truth , I 've been picking up a subtle vibe that she likes you , too .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh yeah , she 's crazy about you .
#Text=All you have to do now is not mess it up .
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , how do I do that ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " The number once mistake nice guys like you make : being too nice .
#Text=" Aang says : " You can be too nice ?
#Text=If you want to keep her interested , you have to act aloof , like you do n't really care one way or the other .
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , okay ... " Meng says : " Hey , Aang , I was wondering ... " Aang says : " See you later ... " Sokka says : " Wow , that kid is good .
